Background:

This is a special edition of the Minisuka Police featuring three sexy Police ladies touring around and doing their stuff in Guam. These girls came from the 6th batch of Minisuka Police.

Highlights of this VHS include swimsuit modeling at the beach, skydiving in miniskirt uniforms and swimming at the pool, also in uniforms.

Minisuka Police is a sort of a late-night reality/gag TV show featuring models dressed in sexy police uniform, wearing short skirts ("minisuka" refers to "miniskirt").

The models are assigned to do various tasks ranging from playing games to doing sexy poses to catching lizards -- anything that makes them accidentally expose their underwear. This is the ultimate upskirts show. ("Upskirt" is "panchira" (????) in Japanese).

As of this writing, there are 13 batches in all. The first batch was shown in 1996.
